text: phir jo (daas) na paaye, to do maheene nirantar roza (vrat) rakhana hai, isase poorv kee ek-doosare ko haath lagaaye. phir jo sakat na rakhe, to saath nirdhanon ko bhojan karaana hai. ye aadesh isalie hai, taaki tum eemaan lao allaah tatha usake rasool par aur ye allaah kee seemaayen hain tatha kaafiron ke lie duhkhadaayee yaatana hai
